Title: Establishes the hours during which alcoholic beverages may be sold on certain international airport property
Summary: Authorizes the sale of alcohol from 6:00 AM to 3:00 AM.
LawSection: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey
LawCode: Add Art VII-F, ยง1 of Chap 154 of 1921
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 154 of the laws of 1921 relating to the Port Authority of New York and New Jersey, in relation to establishing the hours during which alcoholic beverages may be sold at air terminals operated by such authority
